title: La Malga Ristorante Pizzeria Vinoteca
typeOfFood: Vegan-friendly, Lacto, Ovo, Pizza, Italian, Mediterranean, Beer/Wine, Take-out, Non-veg
description: Serves meat, veg options available. Opened by an Italian family in 1982 and as of Spring 2015, still run by the family. Serves classic food including an extensive list of vegan and vegetarian dishes. Uses fresh ingredients and selected wines from Italy. Offers made-in-house desserts. Cozy atmosphere.
